abstract: The Ervell shop is part of the continuing collaboration with the Boffo project.
snippet: The Ervell shop is part of the continuing collaboration with the Boffo project.
lead_paragraph: The Patrik Ervell pop-up at Boffo Building Fashion at 57 Walker Street looks more like a construction site than a high-end designer shop.

headline.main: Look Out: Patrik Ervell at Work
